item.title: Victoria’s Secret Reportedly Announces Leadership Change At Its Adore Me Brand: Here’s The Update
item.description: According to a Bloomberg report citing a person familiar with the matter, Adore Me founder Morgan Hermand-Waiche has left the company.

item.title: Nvidia’s AI Chip Demand Fuels Higher Earnings Projections From Wall Street: Retail’s In Wait-And-Watch Mode

item.title: Nike Reclaims ‘Pole Position’ At Foot Locker Says JPMorgan, Retail Investors Believe CEO Elliott Hill Is Making The ‘Right Moves’
item.description: Meanwhile, Bernstein raised its price target on the stock to $90 from $85 and maintained an ‘Outperform’ rating.

item.title: Novo Nordisk Stock Surges After Pharma Major Cuts Ozempic Cost to $499 Per Month For Self-Paying Patients

item.title: MSNBC To Rebrand As ‘MS NOW’, Drop Peacock Logo Ahead of Comcast Spinoff: Report
item.description: The cable network’s new name stands for ‘My Source News Opinion World,’ the company said in a note to employees seen by The Wall Street Journal.
